channel.title: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor
channel.description:
Hey, Finally got a 508 source,
Added some commands, changed names, etc etc
Still can't add shops tough but ok,
I was wonderin I got this item that I want to make donators only, so only donators can
Spawn/wear the item, Could someone help me,
I have a 508 codeusa source and can't seem to figure it out.
Then my second question is how can I add vesta's ands statius cause when I spawn it now it says Null
I searched all over the internet but I can find any guides and if I find a guide its all BUlby and Paladino76 :S
Thanks Guys

item.title: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

ProjectSix:

i think it should be && p.donator == 1

no it’s fine as it is, that way it says if he ISN’T a donator, he won’t be able to wear the item.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor

item.description:
@ProjectSix wrote:

i think it should be && p.donator == 1

item.title: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor
item.dc:creator: @DeathDrown DeathDrown
item.description:
@DeathDrown wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:2, topic:347136”]Add this to equipment.java and You have to replace the 1307 to your Item id. Also change the message.

if (wearId == 1307 && p.donator == 0) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You must be a donator to use Owner Godsword!!!"); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "fathienserver.smfforfree3.com and click the link called Donate button."); return; }[/quote]

Thank just compiled gonna test it now

EDIT : Do you also know how to add Shops/vesta’s

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor

item.title: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Add this to equipment.java and You have to replace the 1307 to your Item id. Also change the message.

if (wearId == 1307 && p.donator == 0) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You must be a donator to use Owner Godsword!!!"); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "fathienserver.smfforfree3.com and click the link called Donate button."); return; }

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Donators Only Item Problem / Vesta's Armor
